name: Crawling Nightmare's
description:
Discover the secrets of this mysterious place! Don't Lose or Run into these crawling creature's that pop out of nowhere!

Part 2 of "The Crawling Nightmare"

Note: this is a maze game                     buy part 1 and play it before this one

         This game is really fun but has loud noises and generally looks creepy

This game is NOT meant for children
